channel.title: Dueling problem - With Video
channel.description:
When I go to duel someone, I click fun fight, then a duel interface comes up, but when the first person clicks accept, you get connection lost. How do I fix this?
I get this error:
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4634 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21483) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16419) at client.packetSending(client.java:16388) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:57) stealth Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player sam ClientHandler: Client sam disconnected.[/code]
Thanks
Here is a video below. CLICK IT TO PLAY IT.
[URL=http://s195.photobucket.com/albums/z82/musicmad441/?action=view&current=clip0024.flv][IMG]http://i195.photobucket.com/albums/z82/musicmad441/th_clip0024.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Dueling problem - With Video
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Check the case on clicking accept. It says 6674 I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling problem - With Video
item.dc:creator: @b3nj4m1n_8 b3nj4m1n_8
item.description:
@b3nj4m1n_8 wrote:

it seems your client.java has an invisible error. id suggest you find a server that has a proper dueling interface then take it from that source and paste over yours.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 04:36:47 PM[/size][hr]music what is the ip to your server?

Read full topic

item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling problem - With Video
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

WonkeyWoo:

You’ve got one of the oldest dueling script, i’m suggesting. Your piece of code is holding to much information to tell it what to do when that action is done. You may need to find the case of that button and reduce the size.

Does it really matter what one you use? They are the same.

Read full topic

item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

When I go to duel someone, I click fun fight, then a duel interface comes up, but when the first person clicks accept, you get connection lost. How do I fix this?

I get this error:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4634 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21483) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16419) at client.packetSending(client.java:16388) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:57) stealth Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player sam ClientHandler: Client sam disconnected.
